argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | archiabllem.b | |- B = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | archiabllem.0 | |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) |
| 3 |  | archiabllem.e | |- .<_ = ( le ` W ) |
| 4 |  | archiabllem.t | |- .< = ( lt ` W ) |
| 5 |  | archiabllem.m | |- .x. = ( .g ` W ) |
| 6 |  | archiabllem.g | |- ( ph -> W e. oGrp ) |
| 7 |  | archiabllem.a | |- ( ph -> W e. Archi ) |
| 8 |  | archiabllem2.1 | |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) |
| 9 |  | archiabllem2.2 | |- ( ph -> ( oppG ` W ) e. oGrp ) |
| 10 |  | archiabllem2.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ a e. B /\ .0. .< a ) -> E. b e. B ( .0. .< b /\ b .< a ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_ogrpgrp | |- ( W e. oGrp -> W e. Grp ) |
| 12 | 6, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> W e. Grp ) |
| 13 | 6 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B /\ y e. B ) -> W e. oGrp ) |
| 14 | 7 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B /\ y e. B ) -> W e. Archi ) |
| 15 | 9 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B /\ y e. B ) -> ( oppG ` W ) e. oGrp ) |
| 16 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B /\ y e. B ) -> ph ) |
| 17 | 16, 10 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( ( ph /\ x e. B /\ y e. B ) /\ a e. B /\ .0. .< a ) -> E. b e. B ( .0. .< b /\ b .< a ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B /\ y e. B ) -> x e. B ) |
| 19 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B /\ y e. B ) -> y e. B ) |
| 20 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 13, 14, 8, 15, 17, 18, 19 | #P_archiabllem2b | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B /\ y e. B ) -> ( x .+ y ) = ( y .+ x ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_3expb | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x .+ y ) = ( y .+ x ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_ralrimivva | |- ( ph -> A. x e. B A. y e. B ( x .+ y ) = ( y .+ x ) ) |
| 23 | 1, 8 | #P_isabl2 | |- ( W e. Abel <-> ( W e. Grp /\ A. x e. B A. y e. B ( x .+ y ) = ( y .+ x ) ) ) |
| 24 | 12, 22, 23 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ph -> W e. Abel ) |
